tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE recommendation_interactions (
    user_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, product_id, interaction_type)
);

CREATE TABLE user_behaviors (
    user_id INT,
    behavior_type VARCHAR(30),
    frequency INT,
    last_interaction TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, behavior_type)
);

CREATE TABLE recommendation_interaction (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    product_id UUID,
    interaction_type VARCHAR,
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_profile (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR
);
